TopicTitle: Does Phil Plait know of this game?

Articles.Content: Anyone know if the "Bad Astronomer", Doctor Phil Plait, knows of this game? Has he posted here? I don't think I've seen him mention it on his blog. This sort of thing would probably appeal greatly to him.
Seeing as how he's so damn aloof, maybe he does not.
